trends: There have been no other sightings in Cassadaga
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailswe had the video camera set up to film all night and when we got to sleep in our hotel room it appeared in front of our camera and video itself while turning the camera off and it makes a weird sound when it comes in front of the camera .we were at the cassadaga hotel room #25 in cassadaga,florida .it looks like the chest of a grey to us.it has a little shiny dot thing it looks like on its chest it is turning off our camera.we were sleeping and when i woke up the next morning i turned the camera off and unplugged it . when all three of us got up to go to the restroom during the night it is not on the camera and when i went back to bed after restroom visit i checked the camera and it was still on and filming .and when i got up in the morning it was still on .so we have lost time also .i have made a vhs tape of it but i will need a address to send it to so u can see it .the tape is about 48 mins long and it is on the last 10 seconds .the tape should be of the whole night.we were like wow what happened just now .i viewed it alone so i seen it and it scared me i almost dropped my camera .its not like it walks into the frame of the camera it just appears with a sound .i am scared because i dont know what it is .and i have 2 long marks on my upper thighs 1 on each thigh i have not been able to sleep well at all since i seen this on my camera i have showed it to everyone and some think it is a grey and some are just saying wow i dont know what it is but it is sure weird looking .i am worried all the time like i am not ever going to be alone now .if you can help me find out what itis so i can rest again i would be happy.i am not good at writing (as you can tell)letters .thank you.Sylvia Johnson,Virgina Christensen and Mary Walsh. we are still in the State of Florida visiting
Summary: it comes on our video camera and turns it off
